assignments.description: ... assign working variables that will be used by a calling flow.
assignments.name: asn_assignOutputValuesNoResults
assignments.label: Assign the Output Values

value.stringValue: No Contact was resolved with the sourceContact provided. Please verify the contact properties -- and try again.

assignments.description: ... default the contactToResolve to the sourceContact
assignments.name: asn_defaultContactToResolve
assignments.label: Default the Contact to Resolve

assignments.description: ... alert the user that integration is disabled for the specified Contact.
assignments.name: asn_errorIntegrationDisabled
assignments.label: Error: Integration Is Disabled

value.stringValue: Integration for this combination of Contact, B2C CustomerList, and B2C Instance configuration settings is disabled. Please check the environment configuration and try again.

assignments.description: ... call-out that an error occurred / was caught during the resolution process.
assignments.name: asn_errorOccuredDuringResoluion
assignments.label: Error Occurred During Resolution

assignments.description: ... expose the multipleResults to the output.
assignments.name: asn_exposeMultipleResults
assignments.label: Expose the Multiple Results

assignments.description: ... assign a local variable representing the B2C CustomerList and contactToResolve used to validate integration properties.
assignments.name: asn_localWorkingVariables
assignments.label: Assign Local Working Variables

assignments.description: ... pass the argument error forward and return it to the caller.
assignments.name: asn_outputArgumentError
assignments.label: Output the Error Message

assignments.description: ... over-write the contactToResolve as the verifiedContact.
assignments.name: asn_overWriteContactToResolve
assignments.label: Overwrite the Contact to Resolve

assignments.description: ... refresh the sourceContact to leverage the generated composite.
assignments.name: asn_refreshSourceContact
assignments.label: Refresh the Source Contact

assignments.description: ... shorten the contact to include a subset of the overall resolved attributes.
assignments.name: asn_shortenContact
assignments.label: Shorten the Contact

assignments.description: ... shorten the contact to include a subset of the overall resolved attributes.
assignments.name: asn_shortenValidatedContact
assignments.label: Shorten the Contact

assignments.description: ... append the verifiedContact to the resolvedCollection.
assignments.name: asn_verifiedContactToResolvedCollection
assignments.label: Add the verifiedContact to the Resolved Collection

decisions.description: ... evaluate if we can allow integration for the specified Contact.
decisions.name: dec_allowIntegrationForContact
decisions.label: Allow Integration for this Contact?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if we can resolve the Contact record using the identifiers provided.
decisions.name: dec_CanWeResolveThisContact
decisions.label: Was a Contact Resolved?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if an argumentError was caught.
decisions.name: dec_hasArgumentError
decisions.label: Was an Error Caught?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if all resolutionResults should be included in the output.
decisions.name: dec_isReturnMultipleEnabled
decisions.label: Is returnMultiple Enabled?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if all resolutionResults should be included in the output.
decisions.name: dec_isReturnMultipleEnabled_0
decisions.label: Is returnMultiple Enabled?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a sourceContact was verified during the validation process.
decisions.name: dec_wasCompleteContactVerified
decisions.label: Was a Complete Contact Verified?

decisions.description: ... evaluate if a sourceContact was verified during the validation process.
decisions.name: dec_wasContactVerified
decisions.label: Was a Contact Verified?

Flow.description: ... this flow acts as a serviceEntry for the Process and Resolve services -- consuming the same argument structure to provide data exposed by the processServices.
Flow.interviewLabel: B2C Commerce: Process: Contact: Service Helper {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: B2C Commerce: Process: Contact: Helper: Service Entry

recordLookups.description: ... retrieve the Parent Account to the resolvedContact.
recordLookups.name: recGet_Account
recordLookups.label: Retrieve the Parent Account

subflows.description: ... evaluate the configuration of the specified CustomerList and sourceContact to determine if integration should be enabled.
subflows.name: sub_allowIntegrationHelper
subflows.label: Evaluate Integration Configuration

subflows.description: ... attempt to resolve the Contact against the collection of Contacts in this Salesforce Org.
subflows.name: sub_contactResolution
subflows.label: Attempt Contact Resolution

subflows.description: ... attempt to evaluate and verify the Contact argument.
subflows.name: sub_evaluateContactArgument
subflows.label: Evaluate the Contact Argument

variables.description: ... represents the parentAccount to a resolvedContact.
variables.name: Account

variables.description: ... represents the B2C CustomerList that will be used to validate the integration configuration.
variables.name: b2cCustomerList

variables.description: ... represents a resolved Contact record.
variables.name: Contact

variables.description: ... represents the Contact record to be resolved and processed.
variables.name: contactToResolve

variables.description: ... used to collect any error messages caught during processing of this flow.
variables.name: ErrorMessage

variables.description: ... describes if resolution was successful (true = resolution was successful, false = resolution failed).
variables.name: isSuccess

variables.description: ... represents the parentAccount record for the specified Contact.
variables.name: parentAccount

variables.description: ... represents the parent B2C CustomerList for the resolved Contact record.
variables.name: parentB2CCustomerList

variables.description: ... describes the processMode to employ for the current service.
variables.name: processMode

variables.description: ... represents the count of Contacts that were resolved.
variables.name: ResolutionCount

variables.description: ... represents the collection of Contacts that were resolved prior to filtering.
variables.name: ResolvedContacts

variables.description: ... this flag manages if all matched results should be included -- or if just incremental results should be included
variables.name: returnMultiple

variables.description: ... represents a sub-set of Contact attributes to expose representing the resolvedContact.
variables.name: shortenedContact

variables.description: ... represents the sourceContact definition that will be used to resolve customerProfiles.
variables.name: sourceContact

variables.description: ... represents the B2C Commerce customerId representing a customerProfile. This QA variable is used to manually set this contactProperty without defining the contactObject in debug / QA mode.
variables.name: var_qaB2CCustomerID

variables.description: ... represents the B2C CustomerList ID used to test the B2C Contact Resolve flow.
variables.name: var_qaB2CCustomerListID

variables.description: ... represents the customerNo the be used to resolve the Contact within the flow.
variables.name: var_qaB2CCustomerNo

variables.description: ... represents the ContactID of the profile to resolve.
variables.name: var_qaContactID

variables.description: ... represents the emailAddress used to test the B2CContactProcess sub-flow.
variables.name: var_qaEmailAddress

variables.description: ... represents the firstName of the customerProfile to be resolved -- and used to override the existing contact record.
variables.name: var_qaFirstName

variables.description: ... placeholder variable for the contact's lastName; used to test the contact resolve flow.
variables.name: var_qaLastName

variables.description: ... describes if the current flow is operating in QAMode (when checked). Used to override the contactObject with the individual contact attributes labeled with the QA prefix.
variables.name: var_qaMode

variables.description: ... represents a Contact record retrieved using one of the customerProfile identifiers.
variables.name: verifiedContact
